If you have not been watching, these streams now feature new and exclusive Twitch Drops that can be earned simply by watching.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\n\n\u003Cp\u003EWe will also be launching our Partnership Programme later this year, offering content creators their own exclusive Twitch drops their communities can earn by watching them. More on this in the coming months!\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\n\n\u003Cp\u003EWe hope this post clarifies our continued support and plans for Elite. As always, we thank you for your feedback and support.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\n\n\u003Cp\u003EO7\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\n\n\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cem\u003EImage credit: \u003Cspan\u003ECMDR Aymerix\u003C\u002Fspan\u003E\u003C\u002Fem\u003E\u003C\u002Fp\u003E",summary:g},"field-category":ab,"field-feature-in-game":e,"field-featured-bool":c,"field-hide-from-website-listings":e,"field-link":{uri:"https:\u002F\u002Fforums.frontier.co.uk\u002Fthreads\u002Fconsole-profile-transfers-and-2022-updates.603032\u002F",title:ah,options:[]},"field-link-type":a,"field-slug":"console-profile-transfers-and-2022-updates",id:"a9305fa1-5d59-435f-9b5e-059e079eaf21","field-game":[a,a],"field-site":[{langcode:b,name:i,description:a,weight:f,changed:k,"field-influencer-news":c,"field-slug":j,id:l}],"field-image-entity":{langcode:b,name:cR,created:cm,changed:cm,id:"a806023e-30c7-419e-a0fd-8d0b4a158cd5","field-game":[],thumbnail:{langcode:b,filename:cR,uri:{value:jE,url:jF},filemime:d,filesize:jG,created:cm,changed:jH,id:jI},"field-media-image":{langcode:b,filename:cR,uri:{value:jE,url:jF},filemime:d,filesize:jG,created:cm,changed:jH,id:jI}},links:H},{langcode:b,title:"Update 11 Now Live",created:"2022-03-03T17:08:43+00:00",changed:"2022-03-16T16:10:48+00:00","publish-on":a,"unpublish-on":a,"published-at":"2022-03-15T14:00:00+00:00",body:{value:"\u003Cp\u003EGreetings Commanders,\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003EToday we launched Update 11 for \u003Cem\u003EElite Dangerous: Odyssey\u003C\u002Fem\u003E, adding some exciting features for our players, such interior environments to Drake-Class Carriers and a new Protect missions, offering players additional first-person combat challenges to complete.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Ch3\u003EFleet Carrier Interiors\u003C\u002Fh3\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003EPlayers can now use Fleet Carriers as social hubs, enjoying the breathtaking first-person views of space while inside these mobile bases. Take a seat, have a pleasant ride and experience Fleet Carrier jumps from a completely new perspective.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003EFleet Carrier interiors offer players the variety of features and facilities they’re used to at a starport or outpost concourse, and owners can add familiar services on a modular basis. They’ll be able to set prices at Pioneer Supplies, for example, offering players the convenience of a vast array of stock but with an optional taxation to make it worth their while. Other services such as Vista Genomics and the Shipyard are also available, and players can access each of them while inside these social spaces.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003EThe on-board Bar will be of particular interest to Commanders, and not just because it’s a great place to relax. On Fleet Carriers, the Bartender will act as a fully player-driven trading post for all of the resources found while on-foot. The Fleet Carrier owner will be able to manage this service from anywhere in the galaxy, manipulating prices, creating or fulfilling demand, and directly influencing the game's economy as a result. As a customer of a Bartender, players will find new avenues for money-making and obtaining hard-to-find items for upgrading their equipment, driven exclusively by other players.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cdrupal-media data-align=\"center\" data-entity-type=\"media\" data-entity-uuid=\"33e6f761-1622-480f-b888-e69f86f16d79\"\u003E\u003C\u002Fdrupal-media\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003ECommanders fortunate enough to own a Fleet Carrier can enjoy the ultimate in luxury, too: a private owner’s quarters where their Team alone can enjoy a premium view of the Fleet Carrier jump sequence. Owners will be able to enjoy customisation options for the interiors, too, with three different options to select from, available for free in this update.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Ch3\u003EProtect Missions\u003C\u002Fh3\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cem\u003EElite Dangerous: Odyssey\u003C\u002Fem\u003E Update 11 also brings an on-foot defence mission type called Protect to the game. Available from mission givers and mission boards, Commanders will be tasked to defend a specific objective at a given location, if successful then collect a reward once the area is clear. &nbsp;\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003EFinally, with everything going on in the galaxy its natural for Commanders to seek some rest and relaxation, as requested by the community, players will now have the option to sit down in all social spaces in \u003Cem\u003EElite Dangerous: Odyssey\u003C\u002Fem\u003E with the launch of Update 11 – not just those inside Fleet Carriers.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003EDetailed update notes can be \u003Ca href=\"https:\u002F\u002Fwww.elitedangerous.com\u002Fupdate-notes\u002F4-0-11\"\u003Efound here\u003C\u002Fa\u003E.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003ESee you in the black Commanders.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003Eo7\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n",format:F,processed:"\u003Cp\u003EGreetings Commanders,\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\n\n\u003Cp\u003EToday we launched Update 11 for \u003Cem\u003EElite Dangerous: Odyssey\u003C\u002Fem\u003E, adding some exciting features for our players, such interior environments to Drake-Class Carriers and a new Protect missions, offering players additional first-person combat challenges to complete.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\n\n\u003Ch3\u003EFleet Carrier Interiors\u003C\u002Fh3\u003E\n\n\u003Cp\u003EPlayers can now use Fleet Carriers as social hubs, enjoying the breathtaking first-person views of space while inside these mobile bases. Console Development Update",created:"2022-03-10T14:28:19+00:00",changed:"2022-03-10T16:03:01+00:00","publish-on":a,"unpublish-on":a,"published-at":"2022-03-10T16:00:00+00:00",body:{value:"\u003Cp\u003EGreetings Commanders,\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cem\u003EElite Dangerous\u003C\u002Fem\u003E is a game close to my heart.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003EIt’s no secret that \u003Cem\u003EOdyssey’s\u003C\u002Fem\u003E launch was less than ideal, including the need to split the PC\u002Fconsole player base to focus on a PC-only launch. Since \u003Cem\u003EOdyssey’s\u003C\u002Fem\u003E release in May 2021, we have worked tirelessly to improve the \u003Cem\u003EOdyssey\u003C\u002Fem\u003E experience on PC, and whilst we have made great progress there is still more to be done. We have been supporting the pre-\u003Cem\u003EOdyssey\u003C\u002Fem\u003E and post-\u003Cem\u003EOdyssey\u003C\u002Fem\u003E codebases since.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003EOver the last several months, we have been wrestling with the best way to move forward, and it is with a heavy heart we have decided to cancel all console development. We need to be able to move forward with the story of the game, and in order for us to do this we need to focus on a single codebase. \u003Cem\u003EElite Dangerous\u003C\u002Fem\u003E will continue on console as it is now together with critical updates, but we will focus on new content updates on PC on the post-\u003Cem\u003EOdyssey\u003C\u002Fem\u003E codebase.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003EWe appreciate this news is not what our console community were hoping for. This was not an easy decision to make, but it was made with the long-term future of \u003Cem\u003EElite Dangerous\u003C\u002Fem\u003E in mind.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003EWith regards to what is coming next in \u003Cem\u003EElite Dangerous\u003C\u002Fem\u003E, we look forward to sharing further news in due course.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003EDavid Braben\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n",format:n,processed:"\u003Cp\u003EGreetings Commanders,\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\n\n\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cem\u003EElite Dangerous\u003C\u002Fem\u003E is a game close to my heart.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\n\n\u003Cp\u003EIt’s no secret that \u003Cem\u003EOdyssey’s\u003C\u002Fem\u003E launch was less than ideal, including the need to split the PC\u002Fconsole player base to focus on a PC-only launch. Since \u003Cem\u003EOdyssey’s\u003C\u002Fem\u003E release in May 2021, we have worked tirelessly to improve the \u003Cem\u003EOdyssey\u003C\u002Fem\u003E experience on PC, and whilst we have made great progress there is still more to be done. We have been supporting the pre-\u003Cem\u003EOdyssey\u003C\u002Fem\u003E and post-\u003Cem\u003EOdyssey\u003C\u002Fem\u003E codebases since.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\n\n\u003Cp\u003EOver the last several months, we have been wrestling with the best way to move forward, and it is with a heavy heart we have decided to cancel all console development. We need to be able to move forward with the story of the game, and in order for us to do this we need to focus on a single codebase. \u003Cem\u003EElite Dangerous\u003C\u002Fem\u003E will continue on console as it is now together with critical updates, but we will focus on new content updates on PC on the post-\u003Cem\u003EOdyssey\u003C\u002Fem\u003E codebase.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\n\n\u003Cp\u003EWe appreciate this news is not what our console community were hoping for. take care of waves of infantry with the Surge Repeater’s high-powered laser, or protect the skies with the Aculeus Launcher's tracking missiles.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003EYou can check out the Scorpion SRV in action below:\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cdiv data-oembed-url=\"https:\u002F\u002Fwww.youtube.com\u002Fwatch?v=pZiIe_UJC20\"\u003E\r\n\u003Cdiv style=\"left: 0; This new controller is not intended to replace the existing dedicated limpet controllers and will be balanced against these within the game, allowing basic use of multiple limpet types without a dedicated slot for each.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003EThe Multi-Limpet Controller comes in a variety of different types; Xeno, Rescue, Mining, Operations and Universal. Odyssey marks the next step in our vision for the game, and a new era in space simulation.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003EIn honour of this, we’re delighted to present to you our Odyssey launch trailer:\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cdiv data-oembed-url=\"https:\u002F\u002Fwww.youtube.com\u002Fwatch?v=RAb3nH5Eilo\"\u003E\r\n\u003Cdiv style=\"left: 0; width: 100%; height: 0; position: relative; padding-bottom: 56.25%;\"\u003E\u003Ciframe allow=\"encrypted-media; accelerometer; clipboard-write; gyroscope; picture-in-picture\" allowfullscreen=\"\" scrolling=\"no\" src=\"https:\u002F\u002Fwww.youtube.com\u002Fembed\u002FRAb3nH5Eilo?rel=0\" style=\"border: 0; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; position: absolute;\" tabindex=\"-1\"\u003E\u003C\u002Fiframe\u003E\u003C\u002Fdiv\u003E\r\n\u003C\u002Fdiv\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003E“This is the next step in what has already been an incredible journey and labour of love with Elite Dangerous since the Kickstarter over eight years ago. The team have pulled off a fantastic achievement here across a mind-bending scale – from the detail within a human footprint to the vast distances across stellar systems and beyond is breathtaking, in a rich, detailed and accurate recreation of the Milky Way in 1:1 scale. For me it is not just the detailed exploration and combat, but the gothic beauty of watching stars, planets, moons, moons-of-moons rise and fall or slowly pirouette in their often complex paths in the night sky, while each tiny dot or nebula in that sky is really there and can be visited.”\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003EDavid Braben, CEO and founder of Frontier\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003EAs a reminder, all Elite Dangerous servers will be down for maintenance and preparation of the update from \u003Cstrong\u003E07:00 UTC \u002F 08:00 BST\u003C\u002Fstrong\u003E tomorrow for approximately \u003Cstrong\u003E11 hours\u003C\u002Fstrong\u003E.
